title: Whittier Tech Purchases Cutting-Edge Technology for Computer-Aided Design/Drafting and Engineering Pathways - John Guilfoil Public Relations LLC
content: Whittier Tech Purchases Cutting-Edge Technology for Computer-Aided Design/Drafting and Engineering Pathways  John Guilfoil Public Relations LLC
description: HAVERHILL â€“ Superintendent Maureen Lynch is pleased to announce that Whittier Tech recently purchased cutting-edge technology which will be utilized by students in the Computer-Aided Design (CAD)/Drafting and Engineering pathways.
